column5: I have been lucky enough to have taken quite a few trips over the last 15 years or so Every one has been special in its own way - but there are a few traditions we have worked in that are maybe not that traditional?  https://www.northernjacks.com/post/enhance-your-trip-experience  Cheers and as always thanks for checking it out Andrew

great post! love the music on the dock for sure.. last year I did the same on my lure box I thought what the hell and try.. ended up snagging a 40" pike using a 3" ugly black jig I've had sitting in my box for years!
